name: Creepy Crawly in the Caves
description:
Escape The Cave, there might be creepy crawlies lying about. 

Spooky 2D Jam '22    "What's Hiding in the Dark"

This is more of a demo concept game as i ran out of time

Notes 

-You dont lose health after getting hit

-15 Moves to end the game

-25% chance to start in battle
